scene_description_enriched: The image depicts a group of men in prayer. The central figure, with a beard and wearing a blue tunic and a light-colored head covering, is kneeling with his hands clasped in front of him. To his right, another man in a green cap and light-colored tunic is also shown in a praying posture, with his hands together. A third figure, partially visible behind the central figure, appears to be looking upwards. The figures are rendered with simple lines and coloring, suggesting a devotional context.
